title: Pedro was not appropriately dressed to meet Will Ferrell after Chelsea beat Arsenal - Mirror Online
text:
Sport Pedro was not appropriately dressed to meet Will Ferrell after Chelsea beat Arsenal The Blues star had a photo taken with the Anchorman star in just his pants...but didn't seem that bothered Share Put some trousers on mate! (Photo: Darren Walsh) Share Get Chelsea FC updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
These days there is always the risk of a celebrity coming into the changing room after games to congratulate players. 
And if you play for Chelsea there is a chance that celeb could be Will Ferrell, who is well known to be a Blues fan. 
(Even though he was recently pictured at Anfield for Liverpool vs Swansea) 
But Blues star Pedro clearly was not ready for the Anchorman star to burst into the dressing room after their 3-1 victory over Arsenal ...as the photo above shows. 
Pedro is all smiles with the former Saturday Night Live legend - and Marcos Alonso - but in just his pants . 
Clearly, he doesn't seem to care! 
Ferrell was also snapped meeting other Chelsea stars including N'Golo Kante, Eden Hazard and Nemanja Matic; all of who remembered to wear trousers or shorts. (Photo: Darren Walsh) (Photo: Darren Walsh) (Photo: Darren Walsh) 
He was also pictured in the stands with Step Brothers co-star John C. Reilly, who looked like he had come dressed as Sherlock Holmes' long lost step brother. (Photo: Darren Walsh)
